headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Penaud La Coureuse
content:
Meet La Coureuse, Penaud’s retro racing superstar. It’s stripped back, kitted out, and jacked up on enough volts to light up all of Vinewood Boulevard.

Will this turbocharged icon rocket you into a near-future fantasy? Yes. Can the human brain cope with the mind melting scientific leap? There’s only one way to find out… Available now from Legendary Motorsport.
